siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Stan’s kids have been introduced to Boy Meets World. We have a practical life tip for everyone living in cooler climates. We spend the majority of this episode talking about all things Thanksgiving. Listen in and we hope that you have a great Turkey-Day. Stan Lemon…

frontmatter.title: Thanksgiving 2019
tags: life with a twist of lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Jon is back from Nashville, which prompted some follow up on roundabouts. Turns out they have a great patent idea too. Jon also talks about the food he found in Nashville which included our first review in a while! Hulu lost Stan’s business with a price increase…

frontmatter.title: Nashville and Disney+
tags: life with a twist of lemon
